title: Reserved

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Reveal yourself as the Reserved during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Once you reveal yourself, it will be announced to the Town, and your vote will count as three.
- You may only reveal yourself once.
- Once revealed, you cannot send whispers and you will not hear whispers sent to you.
- Once revealed, Town roles that grant defense without counterattacking will not be able to use those abilities on you.

desc:
Post 748
*Sure is a Town Support role.*
